name: A Lonely Button
description: A simple 5ish minute demo of an idea for the GMT Game Jam 2019, with the theme being "only one". With this one, there is only one thing you can interact with, and that's one, single, lonely button. Expect a lot of clicking. This would expanded further if I didn't have life things to deal with, but I'm happy with what I've shown here as a tech demo of sorts. Made in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 with about 4-6 hours of work put in.
